entry.title: Heartburn
entry.summary:
Author: scarletsptember

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,736Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Buck had never been more alone since Eddie left for El Paso. He needed a change, something to help him determine who he was on his own. Becoming a paramedic and moving to Austin was his chance at a fresh start.What he didn't expect was a call out to a school trip and to hear a familiar voice yelling for him. Christopher.A chance reunion with Eddie, knowing that the Diaz's missed Buck as much as he missed them, maybe Buck didn't need to let everything go. Maybe he could have what he's always wanted.

Only one small problem: Buck still hasn’t told anyone he’s married, let alone that he is dating Eddie, and Eddie told everyone he’s married, but forgot to mention he is married to Buck.

entry.title: All the quiet places
entry.summary:
Author: sageevreeen

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,369Chapters: 13/47Kudos: 125

Summary: New walls, old ghosts. Buck is trying to settle into a house that once felt like home, but the silence that follows him is heavier than the boxes he’s unpacking. A fight left words unsaid and distance that keeps stretching. He tells himself he’s fine, that distractions are enough. But some nights are quieter than others; and some silences cut deeper than they should. Or, Buck kisses Eddie before he leaves for El Paso. Buck struggles, falling into unhealthy coping mechanisms, and Eddie comes back to take care of him. Eventually, they find their way to each other; there’s a proposal, a wedding, and a promise that sticks.

entry.title: A Little (Or a Lot) to The Left
entry.summary:
Author: CSRod

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,845Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 14

Summary: "DIAZ!" The voice rumbles through the courtyard making Eddie immediately stand in attention. He knows that this isn't expected in the fire academy, but after two tours in Afghanistan, hearing that authority coming from a superior is an instinctive reaction, so sue him. Noticing what he is doing, Eddie relax his posture and runs in the direction he heard being called. He is kind of apprehensive about being singled out in the middle of the training, but curious when he notices that his instructor isn't alone. "Trainee Diaz, this is Captain Nash from the 118. He is looking for a new talent for his station."~~~~~~~~~~Imagine a 9-1-1 you know, but a lot of things is not how they should be, a little to the left. Or a lot. Here is a world where you know everything that is kind of wrong. But can be fun (or not) who knows.or: What if Buck only join the 118 in season 2, but what if season 2 was all mess up and have calls from season 1, 8 or 4. And the background of some characters was different.

entry.title: Westbound
entry.summary:
Author: MidnightDraft

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,073Chapters: 15/18Kudos: 17

Summary: Right after the season 8 finale, Buck leaves Los Angeles for Santa Monica. Choosing a new home, new friends, and finally, himself. Eddie doesn’t understand why Buck pulled away, and the silence drives him to the edge. But feelings don’t disappear with distance, and eventually, Eddie has to face what he's been avoiding all along. What follows is his clumsy, heartfelt attempt to win Buck back.or...Buck accepts his feelings and moves away, leaving Eddie confused and realizing what he’s lost. Now, Eddie must find a way to win Buck back.

entry.title: something so precious about this
entry.summary:
Author: Aoidee

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,536Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: “When did you last eat?”Buck looks up at him, then away again.“Buck.”Buck huffed, “Everytime I try make something, I make something Bobby taught me. And then I–”“ –Can’t eat it because it's something Bobby made you.” Eddie finishes for him. Buck nods. Eddie nods, looking down at the food. He’s already taken bites out of his but Buck hasn't eaten any of his at all. Hasn’t even picked up his fork. “Right.”or, Buck has been neglecting himself to take care of everyone else and Eddie looks after him.

entry.title: Tuxedo Cakes and Familiar Faces
entry.summary:
Author: Emgiehae

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,922Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: “Ready to go?”“I’ve been ready for a solid ten minutes, Buck. Yes, I’m ready. Let’s get to Costco before there’s too many people.”Buck snorts, “Baby. It’s the middle of the week, this is the perfect time to go to Costco; it’s gonna be hella empty.” He opens the door and Eddie exits the house with a sigh.“Famous last words, Buckley.”“It’s 3pm on a Wednesday! I–” Eddie shows no sign of waiting so Buck takes it upon himself to lock up the house before heading over to the Jeep’s driver side, sliding in behind the wheel. “Who’s gonna be there on a Wednesday afternoon?”“You never know, Buck. You never know.”Or: Buck gets a surprise birthday at Costco

entry.title: Blue Pink White Pink Blue
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,405Chapters: 8/23Kudos: 204

Summary: Bobby noticed him first and went up to him. "Can I help you, young man?"The teenager shuffled forward. "I'm looking for Edmundo, Edmundo Diaz? He works here."Hearing his name, Eddie's brow furrowed. He stepped closer. At first, he didn't recognize the face. The sharp shape of the jaw, the curve of the mouth… then it clicked."Rachel?" He called, a question laced with surprise.The teenager straightened, "I go by Raphael now."***Eddie gets an unexpected visitor one day on shift, it’s his little cousin who needs a place to stay after getting kicked out by his parents :3 Just so everything is clear. This happens in an alternate universe where season 8 happened a lot differently. Bobby is alive and well, Eddie and Chris never went to Texas, the whole Kim Marisol thing never happened and Buck lives with Eddie due to the loft disappearing or something. (Shh. Don’t read too much into it.)Chris is 14.Enjoy :3

entry.title: And somehow, I found my way back to you
entry.summary:
Author: mostly_luminous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,285Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 76

Summary: Evan Buckley hides his pain to avoid burdening others, always putting their needs first. Seen as strong and dependable, he silently struggles while earning praise for having it all together. But no one realizes the emotional cost of being the one everyone relies on—because he never shows how broken he really feels inside.And then, he just wants to stop. Maybe start something new. Somewhere far.So, he left... the 118, his sister, LA.... Eddie.And after 2 years, he still found his way to them........to him.

entry.title: just a little bit of your heart (is all I'm asking for)
entry.summary:
Author: dbolterstar

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 214,135Chapters: 23/40Kudos: 226

Summary: “Does this change a thing between us?” Buck asks, his voice low, his hands still framing Eddie’s face. He can feel the unsteady breaths leaving Eddie’s lips, warm against his own. Eddie looks wrecked. His cheeks are flushed, lips red and kiss-swollen, his glassy eyes locked on Buck’s mouth like it’s the only thing he can see. He looks as hungry as Buck feels. Buck feels Eddie’s fingers trace along his arms, squeezing just enough to leave his skin tingling. “I don’t know.” It’s not a yes—Buck’s not even sure he wants to hear a yes. But it’s so much better than the rejection Eddie threw at him before. “Alright,” Buck exhales, nodding like it’s nothing, even though it feels massive. Then he surges forward, catching Eddie’s mouth in his again. The soft, desperate sound Eddie lets out—like relief and need tangled together—hits Buck like a punch to the chest. or; Eddie’s shame torments him. Buck would rather have a piece of Eddie than nothing at all. Miscommunication is their biggest enemy. Infidelity turns into their savior… or ends up being the thing that destroys them?

entry.title: My Beloved Ghost and Me.
entry.summary:
Author: daggerandrosie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,705Chapters: 10/16Kudos: 33

Summary: “Listen Buckley, I need you to know that this whole…” The officer gestured to his' clothes. “Gothics United Against Following Curfew club you're a part of can end up real bad, you can die kid. Or worse, go to jail.”Buck doesn't think he looks much like a goth, aside from wearing black, and he only does it because it's easier to sneak around like that, there's nothing about him… Scratch that. Officer Gallagher just found him lurking around the cemetery at two in the morning. Because he talks to ghosts.Always have and probably always will.It fucking sucks.It sucks. so. bad.And now he has one. A ghost. In his room. A very handsome one at that, an old cowboy with a cowboy hat, tight pants, boots and big brown eyes.Buck is so, so, very fucked

entry.title: I'm too clever (and then I'm too fucking dumb)
entry.summary:
Author: Tamystardust

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,206Chapters: 9/12Kudos: 147

Summary: “Okay then, we stop,” Buck said. Eddie started to open his mouth, frustration already back on his face but Buck shook his head. “For now. Not permanently. But I kind of agree with Christopher on this one. It’s not just a matter of right place, but also right time. I agree- I agree with you about how we are living. Even if we had gotten the loan, we would still be as tight money-wise, and we would still be miserable.”“At least we’d be miserable in our dream home,” Eddie said, the fight leaving him.“Our dream home is not an over-expensive house in Pasadena,” Buck replied with a tired smile.“No, I guess it’s not,” Eddie said, leaning to drop a soft kiss on Buck's lips. “So we stop?”“We pause. For now.”Or, Buck and Eddie face financial adversity. They do some banking too, and they love each other through it all. How romantic.(Fourth installment of the Messy series, can be read as a stand-alone, but it might make more sense to read the rest before!)

entry.title: My Life Is Better With You
entry.summary:
Author: TheGreenestBean

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 87,279Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 745

Summary: After returning from Afghanistan Buck and Eddie move to LA to put down roots and in the process build the family they deserve, not the ones they were born with.-“What are you doing here?” Buck asked, “I thought you were going to station six?”Eddie had that shit eating grin he got whenever he was being a cheeky bastard, “Last minute change of plans.” He gave a faux nonchalant shrug.Suddenly Buck’s face fell into a suspicious glare, “You’re not fucking with me, are you? Rocking up to tease me with those abs of yours and then fucking off to your actual station?”Eddie’s smile turned fond, enough confirmation that this was for real, “No, I’m here for good.”“Good, I’ll introduce you then.” Eddie followed Buck as he led him back to the small group, “Everyone this is Eddie Diaz, Eddie this is Hen, Bobby and Chimney.”“I didn’t realise you two knew each other.” Bobby said, analysing the two of them.Eddie and Buck began to laugh in unison, “Know each other?” Buck said, speaking through the laugh.“We share a mortgage.” Eddie finished for him.
